channel.title: Reflection on Ángela Castillo-Gill
channel.description: Recent content in Reflection on Ángela Castillo-Gill

item.title: Data science interviews: Lessons learned
item.description: 1 Summary 2 Why? 3 Here’s how I spent my time 3.1 Adapting CVs 3.2 Face-to-face interviews 3.3 Filling out forms 3.4 Interview prep 3.5 Job admin 3.6 Phone calls 3.7 Writing cover letters 4 What would I have done differently? 4.1 Schedule interviews further apart and when possible, in your peak time (i.e. morning or evening person) 4.2 Focus on the basics and then move on to more complex things.
